content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetLocations path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/workload/v1/locations content: params
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get compute locations
desc retrieve information about the stackpath edge network that can host a compute workload
responses
200
v1getlocationsresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
workloadv1location
type obj
props
name
type str
desc a human readable location name
city
type str
desc a locations city
citycode
type str
desc a locations city expressed as an iata airport code
subdivision
type str
desc a locations subdivision
subdivisioncode
type str
desc a locations subdivision code
country
type str
desc a locations country
countrycode
type str
desc a locations iso31661 alpha2 country code
region
type str
desc a locations state or province
regioncode
type str
desc a locations iso31662 region code
continent
type str
desc a locations continent
continentcode
type str
desc a locations continent code
latitude
type num
format double
desc a locations geographic latitude
longitude
type num
format double
desc a locations geographic longitude
desc geographic location information
desc the requested locations
desc a response from a request to retrieve the locations a workload may be created at
title: 10_Infrastructure_GetLocations_58.json
